text_block_list.text: That morning, I had to come in to work a bit early. By the station, I saw a group of primary school kids, on their way to school. While I took in the adorable sight――

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text: ――Good morning!

text_block_list.name: Primary School Kids
text_block_list.text:
G-Good morning!
Good morning...

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
Good. All of you, please stop for a moment. 
Before you cross, make sure to look right, then left...

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text: ――Good. It seems the street is all clear. Now cross!
It wasn't often you saw a Tracen student working before classes. Though the kids seemed a bit scared of how strict she was being...

text_block_list.name: Especially Young Kid
text_block_list.text: G-good morning...

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
Mm. Good morning.
You stop here too.
Carefully look both ways――
(――Vroom, vroom, vrooooom!!)

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
Ngh, that motorbike...!
――Look out!!
――Tch, look where you're going, slowpoke!
text_block_list.name: Recklessly Driving Biker

text_block_list.text: The Tracen student just barely managed to protect the kid from harm. Disaster averted... But the biker already had his hand on the clutch, ready to flee the scene.

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
You are REQUIRED to stop at a crosswalk!!
Reckless driving is a―― You―― Rrgh!!

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text: STOP        RIGHT      THERE!!

text_block_list.name: Especially Young Kid
text_block_list.text: W―― Waaaaahhhhhh!!

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text: A-are you all right!? Are you hurt――

text_block_list.name: Especially Young Kid
text_block_list.text: Wahhhhhhhhh!! I'm so sorryyyyy!!

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
Wh― Why are you apologizing!?
Wait, no... Is it my fault? ...I'm sorry, I didn't mean to upset you...!
No, if anyone was to blame for upsetting her, it'd be that loud, mean, biker. I had to step in here...

choice_data_list: That was scary. But it's OK now.
That was scary, huh? But it's OK now.
text_block_list.text:
I made a mental note to report the biker later... 
But helping the kid came first. I checked for any injuries, and it seemed she was unharmed.
I looked the kid in the eye and spoke to her calmly. "It's OK now. The nice Umamusume was here to protect you, after all. What just happened was not your fault."
I looked the kid in the eye and spoke to her calmly. "It's OK now. The nice Umamusume was here to protect you, after all. What just happened was not your fault."

choice_data_list: There, there, you're OK, you're OK...
text_block_list.name: Especially Young Kid
text_block_list.text: Sniff, sob... Sniff... Mmhm...

text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
text_block_list.text:
Off you go! Take care!
...Heh.

――! 
That's the last of the students I'm helping at this crosswalk.
Mission accomplished.
text_block_list.name: Tracen Student
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
My apologies for not introducing myself.
My name is Fenomeno, and I am a student at Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Are you... a trainer at the Academy, if I may ask?
I'd like to thank you for your help. You were a lifesaver.

choice_data_list: Are you always keeping watch here?
Are you always keeping watch here?
text_block_list.text:
She was polite, just like a real officer should be... 
From what I'd seen so far, it looked like she'd been a crossing guard for a while.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I am. There are no signals here, and it's easy to get caught in a blind spot. Not having a crossing guard would have a direct impact on the children's safety.
Really, though, the fact that she went out of her way to work before class... It was impressive. I couldn't help but praise her for it.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: No, it's only natural. I already make the rounds early in the morning while training, so it's not too much of a burden.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: And above all else... It's my duty to make sure the children of this city stay safe!

text_block_list.name: Fenomono
text_block_list.text:
――Oh, I got caught up in the conversation.
My apologies for keeping you.
choice_data_list: It's fine. What about you, though?
No problem. Though what about you?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There's only ten minutes until the morning assembly...!
If you'll excuse me, I'll return to the academy!

I watched as she ran off in a hurry.
――But...
Ngh... The signal...!!
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno

text_block_list.text:
The crossing sign was still flashing, and wasn't even red yet. But that was all it took to stop her dead in her tracks. 
...Her honest, by-the-book attitude put a smile on my face.

Later that afternoon, I saw Fenomeno at the Academy.  
It made me wonder, did she manage to make it on time...?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
You there. You've been looking back and forth a bit suspiciously... Do you mind if I ask a few questions? 
What are you doing here? State your name, year, and class.
Eek... Uh, nothing! It's nothing, really...!
text_block_list.name: Suspicious Student
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Surely something has to be going on.
Tell me honestly about any of your activities, and I will act accordingly――
It kind of looked like she was holding that girl for questioning... Remembering how by-the-book and uptight she was before, I had to say something.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――Affirmative. She was acting suspiciously.
That's why I presumed there was some kind of trouble, and asked her for more information...

text_block_list.name: Suspicious Student
text_block_list.text:
Huh...? S-she is...?
I'm so sorry, I got the wrong idea...!

It seems like she was looking for something she dropped.
In the end, we all searched for it together.

text_block_list.name: Suspicious Student
text_block_list.text: Um... Thank you so much!

We managed to find it without any issues.
The girl looked a bit shaken up, but went on her way.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much for your assistance, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...It seems people find me menacing.
If you weren't here, I doubt she would tell me what was wrong, let alone let me help her.

Just like this morning...
It seems you're always lending me a hand.
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno

text_block_list.text: The reason she could save the kid and find that lost item was because she was just and kind. All I did was offer a little help.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――! ...Thank you very much for saying that.
It feels a bit like having my hard work recognized.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――I aim to be a hero, you see.
That's why I work hard at my duties, day by day.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――Oh. It seems I've kept you again.
Please, accept my apologies!
choice_data_list: Only natural to help folks in trouble.

text_block_list.text:
So don't worry about me.
Telling her that, I made my exit.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...Such selflessness. Such determined justice...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――What a paragon.
